series_description: Documents the receipt of requests for librarian certification and approval or disapproval. Series includes applications, correspondence, copies of certificates and other related documents. Licensing was done by Department of Commerce prior to 1989.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years then transfer to the Records Center,Library of Virginia. Retain in Records Center 45 years,then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedulecover page. Total retention 50 years.

series_description: Documents the application history, in chronological order for Librarian Certification.

series_title: Minutes of the Librarian Certification Board
series_description: Documents the activities of the now defunct Board for Librarian
retention_statement: Transfer records to the , Library of Virginia for permanent retention.
